title: (x) Futuristic looking square sans in "Metron" logo - Bank Gothic {Andrea Tofano}
content:
Hello all,

I need to recreate a business card for a customer, but I dont know what font they are using. The font I am referring to is in the “Metron” title, and also displayed heavily throughout their website, [http://www.metrontech.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203171938/http:/www.metrontech.com/ "http://www.metrontech.com/")

Does anyone know what font this is or perhaps which one looks very similar?
